mean_cn: adj. 秘密的，偷偷摸摸的，促进分泌的
mean_en: not letting people see or know what you are doing or thinking :tending to act in secret
word_etyma: secret秘密 + ive形容词后缀  → secretive 秘密的
short_phrase: The secretive woman hides in her room.
sentence: The woman is curious as to why her husband is so secretive on the phone.
sentence_trans: 妇人很好奇问什么她丈夫接电话总是偷偷摸摸的。
